videoSnippet.title: Benoni is Back! | Xiong VS Caruana | US Championship 2018.
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator The 2018 U.S. Championship is a 12-player round-robin featuring the strongest players in the USA, who compete for $194,000 in prize money as well as the coveted title of U.S. Champion. If two or more players tie for first place a playoff will be held.

For the 10th consecutive year the Saint Louis Chess Club is hosting the event. Players receive 90 minutes for the first 40 moves followed by 30 minutes for the rest of the game, with a 30-second increment from move one. Draw offers are not allowed before move 30. Official website: uschesschamps.com

Jeffery Xiong vs Fabiano Caruana
US Championship (2018), St Louis, MO USA, rd 3, Apr-20 
Benoni (A61)

1. d4 Nf6 2. Nf3 e6 3. c4 c5 4. d5 d6 5. Nc3 ed5 6. cd5 g6 7. Bf4 Bg7 8. e3 O-O 9. h3 Qe7 10. Nd2 Nh5 11. Bh2 f5 12. Be2 f4 13. O-O fe3 14. Nde4 ef2 15. Kh1 Bc3 16. Nc3 Ng7 17. Bf3 Nd7 18. Rf2 Ne5 19. Re2 Nf5 20. Be5 de5 21. d6 Nd6 22. Qd5 Nf7 23. Ne4 Rb8 24. Qc5 Qc5 25. Nc5 b6 26. Ne4 Bf5 27. Nc3 Rbd8 28. a4 a5 29. Bd5 Rfe8 30. Bf7 Kf7 31. Rf1 Ke6 32. Rfe1 Kf6 33. Rf1 Ke6 34. Rfe1 Kd6 35. Re3 Kc6 36. Nb5 Re7 37. g4 Bd3 38. Nc3 Bc4 39. Rc1 Kb7 40. Re4 Rd4 41. Kg1 Bb3 42. Kf2 Rd2 43. Re2 Rf7 44. Ke3 Rd4 45. Nb5 Rdd7 46. Nc3 Rf4 47. Rd2 Rfd4 48. Rf2 Ba4 49. Rf6 Bc6
